source_sentence: 大清　欽賜雲南法界寺講經廣陵沙門　溥畹　撰十別解文義准常分(三)。

source_sentence: 以上一約破顯談定体以明信解之理竟。
translation: I. The above is a discussion of the essence of concentration in terms of its refutation and explanation in order to explain the principle of faith and understanding.

source_sentence: 一明色即堅固妄想(汝體)
translation: one clear form is a solid, deluded perception (of your essence)

source_sentence: 二明受即虗明妄想(即此)
translation: second, the deluded notion that sensation is paramount (i.e., this)

source_sentence: 三明想即融通妄想(由汝)
translation: three luminous conceptions, that is, deluded conceptions of integration (by you)

source_sentence: 四明行即幽隱妄想(化理)
translation: four understandings of the practice that is, the deluded notion of the occult (principle of transformation)

source_sentence: 五明識即顛倒妄想(又汝)
translation: five illuminating consciousnesses, that is, mistaken and deluded perceptions (and you)
completion of the three bonds (Ānanda)
two transcendences of the depth and shallowness of the aggregates (you and now)
three sequential approaches to extinction (these five)
Two Concluding Exhortations (You Should)
This is the conclusion of the above two sections of the Shōshū.
